onclick("sub", 
        output$sub <- renderUI({
          if(input$userOp1 == '1999' & input$userOp2 == '2000'
             & input$userOp3 == 'year' & input$userOp4 == 'cases') {
            tags$img(src = "correct.gif", width = 230)
            }
          else{
            tags$img(src = "try.gif", width = 200)
            }
          })
        )
        
        
        
     observeEvent(input$submit,{
       if(input$userOp1 == '1999' & input$userOp2 == '2000'
          & input$userOp3 == 'year' & input$userOp4 == 'cases') {
         tags$img(src = "correct.gif", width = 230)
         }
       else{
         tags$img(src = "try.gif", width = 200)
         }
       })

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyr)



tidy4a <-
  gather(table4a,`1999`,`2000`, key = " year ", value = " cases ")


tidy4a$` year ` <-
  as.character(tidy4a$` year `)

table3$year <-
  as.character(table3$year)

tidy4a

tidy4a <-
  tidy4a %>%
  rename(yeard = ` year `)


table3 <-
  table3 %>%
  rename(years = year)




merge(table3, tidy4a, by = 'year',  by.x = 'years', by.y = 'yeard')

left_join(table3, tidy4a, "years"="yeard")


```
